text:
@RandPaul Settle down son
.
You've not been yourself before the lawnmower tackle but
.
you've definitely sunk to the bottom since your COVID-19 infection 
.
while you're at it
.
How about we get some contact tracing 
.
beginning with those days in the closed gym
